comments.comments_text: Heung-Min Son (Tottenham) with a wonderful piece of finishing. He makes a yard for himself after a well-taken pass inside the box and nets into the bottom right corner.

comments.comments_text: West Ham failed to take advantage of the corner as the opposition's defence was alert and averted the threat.

comments.comments_text: A perfect lofted pass from Sergio Reguilon finds Harry Kane (Tottenham), who jumps highest and steers a close-range header into the left side of the goal. His effort was both strong and precise, and Lukasz Fabianski had no chance of stopping that. 3:0.

comments.comments_text: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Michail Antonio (West Ham) was quite harsh and Paul Tierney didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.

comments.comments_text: Perfectly taken free kick! Aaron Cresswell sends a cross in and Fabian Balbuena (West Ham) leaps high to connect with it on the edge of the 6-yard box. His close-range header goes inside the right post and he makes it 3:1.
